name: Ventilation_Plan

title: Ventilation parameters for COVID-19 patients with ARDS

type: ECA Rule (PlanDefinitionType#eca-rule)

status: active

experimental: true

subject: Population_COVID19_Ventilated_With_ARDS

date: 2022-02

publisher: NUM CODEX+ CELIDA

description: In ventilated patients with COVID-19 and ARDS, tidal volume should be ≤ 6 ml/kg standard body weight, end-inspiratory airway pressure ≤ 30 cm H2O.

goal

category: Ventilator care and adjustment (regime/therapy) (SNOMED CT#385857005)

description: Tidal volume ≤ 6 ml/kg standard body weight ()

Targets

-MeasureDetail[x]
*Tidal volume.spontaneous+mechanical/Body weight [Volume/mass] --on ventilator (LOINC#20117-8)?-6

goal

category: Ventilator care and adjustment (regime/therapy) (SNOMED CT#385857005)

description: End-inspiratory airway pressure ≤ 30 cm H2O ()

Targets

-MeasureDetail[x]
*Pressure max Respiratory system airway --during inspiration (LOINC#60951-1)?-30

Actions

-CodeGoalId
*Ventilator care management (procedure) (SNOMED CT#410210009)tidal-volume-goal, end-inspiratory-pressure-goal
